member.name: T:SS.CliMenu.GetCliMenuOptionCmdLet
member.summary:
Returns a CliMenuOptions object with all menu options. This CmdLet has no parameters
Get a list menu options
Returns a CliMenuOptions object with all menu options. This CmdLet has no parameters
Default usage. Returns default menu-items for all menus. $opts = Get-CliMenuOption

member.name: T:SS.CliMenu.NewCliMenuCmdLet
member.summary:
You can create as many menus you like, however you may only have one main Menu. The Menu must have a name, hence the Name parameter is Mandatory. The first Menu you create will become the main Menu even if you do not specify the IsMainMenu switch.
Create a new Menu
You can create as many menus you like, however you may only have one main Menu. The Menu must have a name, hence the Name parameter is Mandatory. The first Menu you create will become the main Menu even if you do not specify the IsMainMenu switch.
Default usage. This will create a new Menu with name MainMenu. If this is the first Menu, it will be created as a main Menu New-CliMenu -Name "MainMenu"

member.name: P:SS.CliMenu.NewCliMenuCmdLet.Name
member.summary:
Normally you would like to specify a name without space and Camel-case the name.
Normally you would like to specify a name without space and Camel-case the name.

member.name: T:SS.CliMenu.NewCliMenuItemCmdLet
member.summary:
Create a new Menu-Item for a Menu.
Create a new Menu-Item for a Menu.
Menu-Items are the action elements of the Menu. You add Menu-Items to a Menu.
Default usage. This will create a new Menu-Item for the menu named passed in. The Menu-object is piped into the New-CliMenuItem cmdlet. $menu | New-MenuItem -Name "UnlockUser" -DisplayName "Unlock a user" -Script { Unlock-UserObject } -DisableConfirm $true

member.name: P:SS.CliMenu.NewCliMenuItemCmdLet.Name
member.summary:
The name of this menu item, for debug/logging purposes.
The name of this menu item, for debug/logging purposes.

member.name: P:SS.CliMenu.NewCliMenuItemCmdLet.DisplayName
member.summary:
The displayed value for this menu item.
The displayed value for this menu item.

member.name: P:SS.CliMenu.NewCliMenuItemCmdLet.Description
member.summary:
Currently not used, possibly used for help menu at some point.
Currently not used, possibly used for help menu at some point.

member.name: P:SS.CliMenu.NewCliMenuItemCmdLet.Script
member.summary:

Script to run when menu is selected.

member.name: P:SS.CliMenu.NewCliMenuItemCmdLet.Func
member.summary:
.Net Func to run when menu is selected. This is to support calling and building native .Net lambda methods from within a Cmdlet.
.Net Func to run when menu is selected. This is to support calling and building native .Net lambda methods from within a Cmdlet.
